references.paper_title: An image is worth 16x16 words: Transformers for image recognition at scale
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of vision transformers, providing the basis for many subsequent works including those using state space models.

references.paper_title: Mamba: Linear-time sequence modeling with selective state spaces
references.reason: This paper introduces the Mamba model, a key component of the SSM-based vision models analyzed in this work, providing the basis for the experimental evaluation and analysis.

references.paper_title: EViT: Expediting vision transformers via token reorganizations
references.reason: This paper details an effective token pruning technique for vision transformers that serves as a baseline for comparison in the paper's experimental evaluations.
This paper is crucial to the object detection experiments in the paper, providing the foundation for the Mask R-CNN model that is used for comparisons.
This paper introduces the ADE20K dataset, which is used for the semantic segmentation experiments, forming a key part of the evaluation.
